36 #define FORCE_F_1_2_THRESH 0.3
37 #define FORCE_F_2_3_THRESH 0.5
38 #define FORCE_SAFETY 5
39 #define UPPER_FEED_ANGLE_THRESH 175 // Do not raise this above 175, bad things happen.
40 #define ROTATION_STEP 5
44 #define ARC_DOWN 1
45 #define ARC_UP 2
46 #define TRANSLATE_BACK 3
47 #define RAISE_CUP 4
48 #define LOWER_CUP 5
49 #define TRANSLATE_UP 6
50 #define TRANSLATE_DOWN 7
51 #define TRANSLATE_FRONT 8
52 #define END_EFF_FRAME "j2s7s300_end_effector"
53 #define BASE_FRAME "j2s7s300_link_base"
54 #define SENSOR_FRAME "forcesensor"

57 #define VEL_LIN_MAX 0.04
58 #define VEL_ANG_MAX 0.4
59 #define VEL_CMD_DURATION 0.8

87 void getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(geometry_msgs::Quaternion orientation, double& roll,double& pitch, double& yaw)
88 {
89  tf::Quaternion quat;
90  tf::quaternionMsgToTF(orientation,quat);
91  quat.normalize();
92  tf::Matrix3x3 mat(quat);
93  mat.getRPY(roll, pitch,yaw);
94 }

100 void waitForActionCompleted()
101 {
102  std::string temp_res="";
103  while(ros::ok())
104  {
105  ros::spinOnce();
106  lock_status.lock();
107  temp_res = result;
108  lock_status.unlock();
109 
110  if (temp_res=="Stopped")
111  {
112  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Status : " << temp_res);
113  //Wait a little extra for arm to settle due to inertia.
114  ros::Time start = ros::Time::now();
115  while(ros::Time::now()-start < ros::Duration(0.2)) ros::spinOnce();
116  break;
117  }
118  }
119 }

127 void setPoseForDirection(int direction, geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& start_pose,double distance)
128 {
129  geometry_msgs::Quaternion quat;
130  switch(direction)
131  {
133  case ARC_DOWN :
134  quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(angles::from_degrees(ROTATION_STEP),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0)); //Turn down
135  start_pose.header.frame_id=END_EFF_FRAME;
136  start_pose.pose.position.x=0;
137  start_pose.pose.position.y=0.01; // Slightly up
138  start_pose.pose.position.z=-0.01; // Slightly back
139  start_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
140  break;
141  case ARC_UP :
142  quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(angles::from_degrees(-ROTATION_STEP),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0));
143  start_pose.header.frame_id=END_EFF_FRAME;
144  start_pose.pose.position.x=0;
145  start_pose.pose.position.y=-0.01;
146  start_pose.pose.position.z=0.01;
147  start_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
148  break;
149  case TRANSLATE_BACK :
150  quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0));
151  start_pose.header.frame_id=END_EFF_FRAME;
152  start_pose.pose.position.x=0;
153  start_pose.pose.position.y=0;
154  start_pose.pose.position.z=-distance;
155  start_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
156  break;
157  case TRANSLATE_FRONT :
158  quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0));
159  start_pose.header.frame_id=END_EFF_FRAME;
160  start_pose.pose.position.x=0;
161  start_pose.pose.position.y=0;
162  start_pose.pose.position.z=distance;
163  start_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
164  break;
165 
167  }
168 }
169 
175 geometry_msgs::TwistStamped getTwistForDirection(int direction)
176 {
177  geometry_msgs::TwistStamped twist;
178  twist.header.stamp=ros::Time::now();
179  twist.header.frame_id="j2s7s300_link_7";
180  switch(direction)
181  {
182  case ARC_DOWN:
183  ROS_INFO("Arc down");
184  twist.twist.linear.z=VEL_LIN_MAX;
185  twist.twist.angular.x=VEL_ANG_MAX;
186  break;
187 
188  case ARC_UP:
189  ROS_INFO("Arc up");
190  twist.twist.linear.z=-VEL_LIN_MAX;
191  twist.twist.angular.x=-VEL_ANG_MAX;
192  break;
193 
194  case TRANSLATE_BACK:
195  ROS_INFO("Translate back");
196  twist.twist.linear.x=-VEL_LIN_MAX;
197  break;
198 
199  case RAISE_CUP:
200  ROS_INFO("Raise Cup");
201  twist.twist.angular.x=VEL_ANG_MAX;
202  break;
203 
204  case LOWER_CUP:
205  ROS_INFO("Lower Cup");
206  twist.twist.angular.x=-VEL_ANG_MAX;
207  break;
208 
209  case TRANSLATE_UP:
210  ROS_INFO("Translate up");
211  twist.twist.linear.z=VEL_LIN_MAX;
212  break;
213 
214  case TRANSLATE_DOWN:
215  ROS_INFO("Translate down");
216  twist.twist.linear.z=-VEL_LIN_MAX;
217  break;
218 
219  }
220  return twist;
221 }

227 bool checkUpperAngleThreshold();
232 bool checkLowerAngleThreshold();
237 void fallback(bool emerg=false);

243 bool isForceSafe()
244 {
245  double local_force_f;
246  lock_force.lock();
247  local_force_f=force_f;
248  lock_force.unlock();
249 
250  if (local_force_f >= FORCE_SAFETY)
251  {
252  ROS_WARN_STREAM("PAIN THRESHOLD BREACHED!!");
253  return false;
254  }
255  else
256  return true;
257 }
258 
263 bool isAudioSafe()
264 {
265  lock_emerg.lock();
266  bool emerg = emergency;
267  lock_emerg.unlock();
268 
269  if (emerg) ROS_WARN_STREAM("AUDIO EMERGENCY DETECTED!!");
270  return !emerg;
271 }

278 void publishTwistForDuration(geometry_msgs::TwistStamped twist_msg, double duration)
279 {
280  ros::Time time_start = ros::Time::now();
281  while (ros::Time::now() - time_start < ros::Duration(duration))
282  {
283  ros::spinOnce();
284  cmd_vel.publish(twist_msg);
285  }
286 }

293 void positionControlDriveForDirection(int direction, double distance)
294 {
295  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped start_pose, pose_in_base;
296  tf::TransformListener tf_listener;
297  //Wait for TF buffer to fill up
298  ros::Duration(0.25).sleep();
299  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
300 
301  while(ros::ok())
302  {
303  try
304  {
305  lock_pose.lock();
306  start_pose = current_pose;
307  lock_pose.unlock();
308 
309  setPoseForDirection(direction, start_pose, distance);
310 
311  tf_listener.transformPose(BASE_FRAME,start_pose,pose_in_base);
312  break;
313 
314  }
315  catch (tf::ExtrapolationException e)
316  {
317  /* ROS_INFO_STREAM("Waiting for transform "
318  //<< e.what()
319  );*/
320  }
321  ros::spinOnce();
322  loop_rate.sleep();
323  }
324 
325  cmd_pos.publish(pose_in_base);
326 }
327 
332 void driveToRollGoalWithVelocity(int direction)
333 {
334  if(direction == RAISE_CUP)
335  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Raise Cup");
336  else if (direction == LOWER_CUP)
337  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Lower Cup");
338  else
339  {
340  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Wrong direction given!!");
341  return;
342  }
343 
344  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped start_pose, goal_pose, temp_pose;
345 
346  lock_pose.lock();
347  start_pose=current_pose;
348  lock_pose.unlock();
349 
350  double temp_rol, temp_pit, temp_yaw;
351  double goal_rol, goal_pit, goal_yaw;
352  double start_rol, start_pit, start_yaw;
353  double del_rol;
354 
355  goal_pose = start_pose;
356 
358  tf::Quaternion q_rot = tf::createQuaternionFromRPY(angles::from_degrees( direction==RAISE_CUP?ROTATION_STEP:-ROTATION_STEP),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0)); // Rotate about x by 20 degrees
359  tf::Quaternion q_start; tf::quaternionMsgToTF(start_pose.pose.orientation, q_start);
361  tf::Quaternion q_goal = q_start*q_rot;
362 
363  tf::quaternionTFToMsg(q_goal,goal_pose.pose.orientation);
364 
365 
366  ros::Rate loop_rate(100);
367  //ros::Time start = ros::Time::now();
368  while(ros::ok())
369  {
370  lock_pose.lock();
371  temp_pose = current_pose;
372  lock_pose.unlock();
373 
374  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(goal_pose.pose.orientation, goal_rol, goal_pit, goal_yaw);
375  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(temp_pose.pose.orientation, temp_rol, temp_pit, temp_yaw);
376  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(start_pose.pose.orientation, start_rol, start_pit, start_yaw);
377 
378  del_rol = goal_rol - temp_rol;
379 
380  if (std::fabs(del_rol)>=thresh_ang)
381  {
382  geometry_msgs::TwistStamped twist_msg;
383  twist_msg.twist.linear.x = 0;
384  twist_msg.twist.linear.y = 0;
385  // Comment out next line ONLY if using end-effector mode ie: Mode 1 on jostick is active and 4th blue LED on far right is active.
386 // twist_msg.twist.linear.z = direction == LOWER_CUP? -thresh_lin : thresh_lin;
387  twist_msg.twist.angular.x= del_rol>0?VEL_ANG_MAX:-VEL_ANG_MAX;
388  twist_msg.twist.angular.y = 0;
389  twist_msg.twist.angular.z= 0;
390 
391  if(isForceSafe() && isAudioSafe())
392  {
393  cmd_vel.publish(twist_msg);
394  }
395  else
396  {
397  ROS_WARN("ABORTING SEQUENCE!!!");
398  fallback(true);
399  ros::shutdown();
400  }
401  }
402  else
403  {
404  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Goal reached, breaking loop");
405  break;
406  }
407 
408  ros::spinOnce();
409  loop_rate.sleep();
410  }
411 
412 }
413 
420 void moveCup(int direction, double duration=VEL_CMD_DURATION, double distance=0.1)
421 {
422  if (direction==TRANSLATE_BACK || direction==TRANSLATE_FRONT)
423  {
424  positionControlDriveForDirection(direction, distance);
425  return;
426  }
427  else
428  {
429  geometry_msgs::TwistStamped twist_msg = getTwistForDirection(direction);
430  publishTwistForDuration(twist_msg, duration);
431 
432  }
433  return;
434 }

441 {
442  lock_pose.lock();
443  current_pose=pose;
444  lock_pose.unlock();
445 }

454  force_f=msg->forceF;
455  force_b=msg->forceB;
456  lock_force.unlock();

473 void waitForPoseDataAvailable()
474 {
475  // This loop to wait until subscriber starts returning valid poses.
476  ros::Rate loop_rate(9);
477  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped temp_pose;
478  while(ros::ok())
479  {
480  lock_pose.lock();
481  temp_pose = current_pose;
482  lock_pose.unlock();
483 
484  ros::spinOnce();
485  loop_rate.sleep();
486 
487  if (temp_pose.pose.position.x != 0) break;
488  }
489  ROS_INFO("Pose data available");
490 }
491 double getCurrentRollDegrees();
492 bool checkUpperAngleThreshold()
493 {
494  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped temp_pose;
495 
496  lock_pose.lock();
497  temp_pose=current_pose;
498  lock_pose.unlock();
499 
500  double temp_roll, temp_pitch, temp_yaw;/*
501  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(temp_pose.pose.orientation,temp_roll, temp_pitch, temp_yaw);*/
502  temp_roll = getCurrentRollDegrees();
503 
504 // ROS_INFO_STREAM("Checking current roll " << temp_roll <<
505 // " + " << ROTATION_STEP <<
506 // " vs limit " << UPPER_FEED_ANGLE_THRESH );
507 
508 
509  if ( temp_roll + ROTATION_STEP >= UPPER_FEED_ANGLE_THRESH)
510  {
511  ROS_WARN_STREAM("MAX UPPER FEED ANGLE REACHED");
512  return false;
513  }
514  else
515  {
516  return true;
517  }
518 }
519 
520 bool checkLowerAngleThreshold()
521 {
522  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped temp_pose;
523 
524  lock_pose.lock();
525  temp_pose=current_pose;
526  lock_pose.unlock();
527 
528  double temp_roll, temp_pitch, temp_yaw;
529 // getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(temp_pose.pose.orientation,temp_roll, temp_pitch, temp_yaw);
530  temp_roll = getCurrentRollDegrees();
531 
532  if (temp_roll - (int)angles::to_degrees(lower_angle_thresh) < ROTATION_STEP/2 )
533  {
534 // ROS_WARN_STREAM("MAX LOWER ANGLE REACHED. LIMIT: " << angles::to_degrees(lower_angle_thresh) << " CURRENT: " << temp_roll);
535  return false;
536  }
537  else
538  {
539 // ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current roll: " << (temp_roll));
540  return true;
541  }
542 }
543 
548 double getCurrentRoll()
549 {
550  lock_pose.lock();
551  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped temp_pose = current_pose;
552  lock_pose.unlock();
553 
554  double temp_rol, temp_pitch, temp_yaw;
555  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(temp_pose.pose.orientation, temp_rol, temp_pitch, temp_yaw);
556 
557  return temp_rol;
558 }
559 
564 double getCurrentRollDegrees(){
565  double temp_roll = getCurrentRoll();
566  if (temp_roll >= 0) return angles::to_degrees(getCurrentRoll());
567  return angles::to_degrees(getCurrentRoll()) + 360;
568 }
569 
574 void callFallbackTimer(double duration)
575 {
576 
577  ros::Time start = ros::Time::now();
578  ros::Duration run_for(duration);
579  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
580  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Starting fallback timeout for: " << duration << "s.");
581  while(ros::Time::now() - start <= run_for)
582  {
583  lock_force.lock();
584  double force = force_f;
585  lock_force.unlock();
586 
587  if (force>= FORCE_F_2_3_THRESH)
588  {
589  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Force detected, breaking out of timer");
590  return;
591  }
592 
593  loop_rate.sleep();
594  ros::spinOnce();
595  }
596 
597  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Time out! Initialising fallback");
598  // moveCup(TRANSLATE_BACK);
599  fallback();
600  ros::shutdown();
601  exit(1);
602 }
603 
610 void fallback(bool emerg)
611 {
612  lock_pose.lock();
613  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped start_pose=current_pose;
614  lock_pose.unlock();
615 
616  double roll, pitch, yaw;
617  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(start_pose.pose.orientation, roll, pitch, yaw);
618 
619  int yaw_degrees = angles::to_degrees(yaw);
620 
621  // ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current yaw float: " << angles::to_degrees(yaw) << " int " << yaw_degrees);
622 
623  geometry_msgs::TwistStamped twist_cmd;
624 
625  // y = mx + c
626  double m = 0.004444444;
627  double velx_c = 0.8;
628  double vely_c = 0.4;
629 
630 
636 
637  if (yaw_degrees >= -180 && yaw_degrees < -90)
638  {
639  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Sector 1");
640  twist_cmd.twist.linear.x = m * yaw_degrees + velx_c;
641  twist_cmd.twist.linear.y = m * yaw_degrees + vely_c;
642  }
643  else if (yaw_degrees >= -90 && yaw_degrees <0)
644  {
645  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Sector 2");
646  twist_cmd.twist.linear.x = -m * yaw_degrees;
647  twist_cmd.twist.linear.y = m * yaw_degrees + vely_c;
648  }
649  else if (yaw_degrees >= 0 && yaw_degrees <90)
650  {
651  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Sector 3");
652  twist_cmd.twist.linear.x = -m * yaw_degrees;
653  twist_cmd.twist.linear.y = -m * yaw_degrees + vely_c;
654  }
655  else if (yaw_degrees >= 90 && yaw_degrees <=180)
656  {
657  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Sector 4");
658  twist_cmd.twist.linear.x = m * yaw_degrees - velx_c;
659  twist_cmd.twist.linear.y = -m * yaw_degrees + vely_c;
660  }
661  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Publishing twist : ");
662  //std::cout << (twist_cmd) << std::endl;
663  if (emerg==true) twist_cmd.twist.angular.x = -1;
664  publishTwistForDuration(twist_cmd,1);
665 }
666 
671 void audioGrabber(audio_emergency::AudioMessage::ConstPtr msg)
672 {
673  lock_emerg.lock();
674  if (msg->result == "talk") emergency = true;
675  lock_emerg.unlock();
676 }

678 
679 int main(int argc, char **argv)
680 {
681  ros::init(argc, argv, "feeder_straight_1D");
682  ros::NodeHandle nh;
683 
684  tf::TransformListener tf_listener;
685 
686  ros::Subscriber sub = nh.subscribe("/force_values", 1000, forceGrabber);
687  cmd_vel = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::TwistStamped>("/RobotControl/VelocityControl", 1000);
688  cmd_pos = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("/RobotControl/PoseControl", 1000);
689  ros::Subscriber tool_pose = nh.subscribe("/j2s7s300_driver/out/tool_pose",1000, poseGrabber );
690  ros::Subscriber control_status = nh.subscribe("/RobotControl/Status",1000, statusGrabber );
691  ros::Publisher arm_pose_pub = nh.advertise<std_msgs::Int32>("/arm_state", 1000);
692  ros::Subscriber audio_emerg = nh.subscribe("/audio_emergency",1000, audioGrabber );
693 
694  waitForPoseDataAvailable();
695 
696  double local_force_f;
697  bool print_once_only=true;
698 
700  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Initial rotation from " << angles::to_degrees(getCurrentRoll()));
701  moveCup(RAISE_CUP, VEL_CMD_DURATION);
702  ros::Duration(1.0).sleep(); // Allow inertial settlement
703  ros::spinOnce();
704 
705  lock_pose.lock();
706  initial_pose=current_pose;
707  lock_pose.unlock();
708 
710  double r,p,y;
711  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(initial_pose.pose.orientation,r,p,y);
712  lower_angle_thresh = r;
713  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Lower feed angle thresh set to " << angles::to_degrees(lower_angle_thresh));
714 
716  step_count = 0;
717  int prev_step_count = 0;
718 
719  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
720  while(ros::ok())
721  {
722  ros::spinOnce();
723 
724  lock_force.lock();
725  local_force_f=force_f;
726  lock_force.unlock();
727 
728 
729 
730  if (local_force_f >= 0 && local_force_f <= FORCE_F_1_2_THRESH && checkLowerAngleThreshold())
731  {
732  ROS_INFO("---------------------------------------------------------------------");
733  driveToRollGoalWithVelocity(LOWER_CUP);
734  prev_step_count = step_count--;
735  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Step : " << prev_step_count << " -> " << step_count << " @ roll : " << angles::to_degrees(getCurrentRoll()));
736  print_once_only=true;
737  ROS_INFO("---------------------------------------------------------------------");
738  ROS_INFO(" ");
739 
740  if (prev_step_count > step_count &&
741  std::fabs((int)angles::to_degrees(getCurrentRoll()) - (int)angles::to_degrees(lower_angle_thresh)) <= ROTATION_STEP/2 )
742  {
743  callFallbackTimer(3);
744  }
745  }
746 
747  else if (local_force_f >= FORCE_F_2_3_THRESH
748  && local_force_f <= FORCE_SAFETY
749  && checkUpperAngleThreshold())
750  {
751  ROS_INFO("---------------------------------------------------------------------");
752  driveToRollGoalWithVelocity(RAISE_CUP);
753  prev_step_count = step_count++;
754  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Step : " << prev_step_count << " -> " << step_count << " @ roll : " << angles::to_degrees(getCurrentRoll()));
755  print_once_only=true;
756  ROS_INFO("---------------------------------------------------------------------");
757  ROS_INFO(" ");
758  }
759 
760  else if (print_once_only)
761  {
762  ROS_INFO("---------------------------------------------------------------------");
763  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Do nothing.");
764  print_once_only=false;
765  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Step : " << prev_step_count << " -> " << step_count << " @ roll : " << angles::to_degrees(getCurrentRoll()));
766  ROS_INFO("---------------------------------------------------------------------");
767  ROS_INFO(" ");
768 
769  }
770 
771 
772  loop_rate.sleep();
773  std_msgs::Int32 arm_pose_msg;
774  arm_pose_msg.data=step_count;
775  arm_pose_pub.publish(arm_pose_msg);
776  ros::spinOnce();
777 
778  if (!isAudioSafe())
779  {
780  ROS_WARN_STREAM("ABORTING SEQUENCE!!");
781  fallback(true);
782  ros::shutdown();
783  }
784  else
785  {
786 // ROS_INFO("Audio safe");
787  }
788  }
789  return 0;
790 }
VEL_CMD_DURATION
#define VEL_CMD_DURATION
Definition: feeder_straight_1D.cpp:59
main
int main(int argc, char **argv)
Definition: feeder_straight_1D.cpp:679

double force_b
Definition: feeder_straight_1D.cpp:74
